entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double.ToString with two section separators and negative zero placing additional negative sign in output #70460
  • [NativeAOT] CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject can be reentrant on NativeAOT and deadlock #70453
  • FileSystemWatcher_SymbolicLink_IncludeSubdirectories_DoNotDereferenceChildLink failed (OSX) #70450
  • `ConsoleStream.ReadByte` throws when `Console.Encoding` is UTF-16 #70448
  • Compiling Wasm AOT breaks when using protobuf-net 2.x as a dependency #70444
    7.0.0
  • System.Uri regression in .NET 7 #70443
  • StringComparer.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase.GetHashCode is broken (on Blazor) #70441
  • Feature request: Support DependencyContext.Default for single file applications #70438
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete crypto factory methods accepting a string #70436
  • [Mobile] SSL certificate hostname not verified when targeting local WebAPI #70434
  • [NativeAot] Integrate SingleFileTestRunner to the default runner #70432
  • TimeSpan.ParseExact throws exception for non-padded custom format specifiers in compound format strings #70429
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IGetDebuggerDisplay #70426
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicProvider #70424
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #70422
  • [API Proposal]: Allow custom JavaScriptEncoder that allows HTML-sensitive characters #70419
  • Complex architecture using DI scoped service #70415
  • Test failure System.Management.Tests.ManagementObjectTests.Invoke_Instance_And_Static_Method_Win32_Process #70414

Closed

  • Inefficient codegen for enum -> object -> int casts #55355
    7.0.0
  • Remove the pid argument from createdump command line and only take dumps on the parent process #42646
    7.0.0
  • Cannot understand the API design of Generic Math INumber.Create[XXXX] methods #62296
    7.0.0
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile #70411
  • Expose TCP Keep-alive on SocketsHttpHandler #61261
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures on NodeJS/Linux because RemoteExecutor is not supported #64776
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !LongFile::IsPathNotFullyQualified(path) || !LongFile::ContainsDirectorySeparator(path) #70293
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->AsCast()->gtCastType == m_tailcall->gtReturnType) && "Expected cast after tailcall to be no-op"' #70334
    7.0.0
  • Mono runtime pack should include include/ directory on desktop, too #46461
    7.0.0
  • [macOS 11] System.Tests.EnvironmentTests.OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX fails on CoreCLR #49106
    7.0.0
  • IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() marked as non-nullable even though it can return null values as a LEFT JOIN #69817
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to Stopwatch #70425
  • [wasm][debugger] Send ASSEMBLY_LOAD event #54772
    Future
  • Mono debugger crashes attempting to breakpoint in a DIM in a generic interface #64408
    7.0.0
  • System. Drawing. Common does not support webp #70418
  • [Question] Interop between JsonNode and JsonElement #70427
  • Stack overflow due to recursion in WebAssembly produces assertion failure #68798
    7.0.0
  • CertificateSelection callback is not called when client use Unified framing #68310
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate list?.Count #69133
    7.0.0
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69488
    Future
  • Logger using json format not display lists correctly #68975
    Future
  • Runtime error when invoking native dependency from Blazor/WebAssembly #62085
    7.0.0
  • System.ExecutionEngineException crash when debugging (0x80131506) #70409
  • Revisit NonBacktracking's avoiding of findOptimizations.LeadingAnchor #69060
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR error while ILC.exe compiling Microsoft.CSharp in multifile mode #69593

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SAFEARRAY APIs from PAL #70462
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bump intellisense version to Preview4 #70459
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Dispose algorithm in SignatureSupport #70458
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [NativeAOT] prevent reentering CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject #70456
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove <Nullable>disable/annotations</Nullable> from test projects #70455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable nullable for Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces #70454
  • JIT: Unspecialize handle types after arithmetic ops in VN #70452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Make calls from the cold cconv wrappers through the PLT. #70449
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X #70447
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Let low cost tree nodes reach CSE phase #70446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the various generic math functions to have default implementations #70445
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable HMAC on Browser WASM #70442
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add disasm comments for field data addresses and code addresses #70437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable should not wait until buffer is filled. #70430
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Handle HW exceptions on Windows without redirection #70428
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][nodejs] Ensure that stdout/stderr have been flushed out before exiting #70416
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix unit test example in documentation #70457
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Guard COM exception marshaling under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #70431
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary regex NonBacktracking code #70364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0-preview5] [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70383
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.7 #70372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase precision and safety of the NonVersionableAttribute #70327
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add legs to build wasm with internal threads only and full threading enabled #68787
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove old macOS compatibility code for RSA decryption #70397
    area-System.Security
  • Convert assert to exception for loading native libraries #70319
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary normalization for GT_RET_EXPR #70340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't call RuntimeHelper.Equals in Object.Equals #70420
    community-contribution
  • Include `include` folder in runtime pack on all Mono platforms #69719
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete a zero-diff quirk and update `INDEX`-related comments #70398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ActiveIssue on OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX #70367
    area-System.Runtime
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • update dogfooding instruction for 7.0 #70423
    area-Meta
  • Stop normalizing managed calls in R2R #70339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for processing Unified TLS frames #69848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support for null-conditional operators in simple expressions #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Disable 2 FSW tests failing only on macOS 12 #70365
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: enable cloning based on loop invariant type tests #70377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Removing usage of serilog #70382
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: add ability to order blocks in dump by bbNum or bbID #70399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak NonBacktracking condition used to employ RegexFindOptimizations #70405
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve Stopwatch DebuggerDisplayAttribute test #70394
    area-System.Diagnostics

Updated

  • Fix Crossgen2 PDB generator #70407
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • JIT: Do not propagate some constants #70378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Reenable C4244 and enable implicit-int-conversion in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Move analyzer and fixer tests into FuncionalTests project #70406
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Detect inlining accurately and skip generating precode fixups for inlines that do not succeed #70379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Add support for baseUrl and mainScriptPath #70375
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add basic testing infrastructure in NativeAOT (port from dotnet/linker) #70408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove unneeded unconditional jumps for Arm/Arm64 #70389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No warnings are generated for Trimmed or SingleFile apps when SDD is not specified and rid is specified other than via commandline #25925
  • Task common files should support nullable enable #25920

Closed

  • exclude markdown changes from triggering a build in pipeline #25664
  • [dotnet 6] `dotnet test` does not allow passing `--arch` and `--results-directory` together #24728
  • build macOS (Arm64) Run: segmentation fault #25440

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25926
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update dotnet-format to 7.0.330803 #25922
    Area-CodeFlow
  • fix(cli): handle sln folders in workload restore command #25919
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update man pages #25755
  • Exclude documentation changes from triggering builds #25842
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Follow-Up on compatibility tooling refactoring #25816
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Explain the Purpose of Dogfood in The Dev Guide #25905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25898
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Getting Aot HelloWorld to be warning free #25927
    Area-ILLink
  • Fix Description for Pre-Release Reinstallation Updates #25900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure the Razor generator doesn't generate when it's suppressed #25833
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Extension function members" #192

  • [Proposal]: Relaxing shift operator requirements #4666

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename unused variable to match similar usage #61790
  • DiagnosticAnalyzerService.GetDiagnosticsAsync does not return additional file diagnostics #61789
  • Metadata as source is collapsing empty accessors. #61788
  • Update ModuleMetadata to hold onto an object it can keep-alive. #61778
    C# 11.0
  • Unable to override severity of single rules when dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.severity != unset|default #61777
  • Investigate VB assertion failure #61776
  • IDE0065: Global usings must not be places inside namespace #61773
    Backlog
  • StringCopyPaste test phyically write to the clipboard causing flakyness #61764
    17.3

Closed

  • Show warning if function return value is not used #61420
    Backlog
  • Move to namespace refactoring doesn't work with file-scoped namespace #61539
    17.3
  • VS17.2.3+ Rename symbol -> "rename symbols file" checkbox disabled #61726
    17.3
  • Issue: Lock Congestion using CSharpSyntaxRewriter #61716
  • .editorconfig doesn't affect ctrl-shift-B / command-line builds? #61724
    17.3
  • Convert switch statement to expression - incorrect 'OR' operator for fallthrough options #61468
    17.3
  • Natively supporting System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting APIs #61445
  • js and css no code prompt in asp.net core project, say CSS Language Server (VSCode) failed to initialize #61769
  • Improved UX (error message) for generator users using outdated Roslyn version #61774
  • indentation is off when fixing up usings after a paste (32531.40.main) #61605
    17.3
  • Implementation of SourceUserDefinedOperatorSymbolBase.IsSelfConstrainedTypeParameter might need an adjustment once the design settles #53801
    C# 11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't report operation canceled exceptions as faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Add Move Static Member To Existing Type (#61519)" #61786
    Area-IDE
  • Use inline rename session options for all checkboxes directly #61785
    Area-IDE
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Fix lexing of the end of pp directives #61782
    Area-Compilers
  • Add asp.net extensibility hooks for embedded language brace matching #61779
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • Add experimental option to semantic snippet experience #61750
    Area-IDE
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove LogPositionChanged, it's not needed for data anymore #61781
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add explanation of IDE design process and include template #61751
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update DartLab pipeline to use new agent template #61755
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Mark parameter that cannot be null as non-nullable #61766
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [LSP] Disable sln crawler diagnostics when LSP pull is enabled #61396
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove ISupportDirectMemoryAccess. #61693
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Provide an extensibility point for embedded language brace highlighting #61756
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Highlight static local function use sites as static #61748
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61768
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61767
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include IndentBlockFormattingRule in AddMissingImportsService #61761
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61765
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove obsolete comments referencing an issue. #61740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove delegate and capture allocations #61719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61791
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Check 'scoped' differences in overrides and interface implementations #61738
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate implementations of IPreprocessingSymbol #39201
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Annotate implementations of IRangeVariableSymbol #39202
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Annotate implementations of IPointerTypeSymbol #39203
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Require spaces within line span directives and relax LangVer check #61686
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Filter out tracked document changes in semantic tokens handler #61760
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intermittent `NullReferenceException` from `DefaultHttpRequest.Form` #42100
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #42096
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_nodejs #42095
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 3): Session #42092
    7.0-preview6
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 2): General Usage #42091
    7.0-preview6
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 1): HttpContext #42090
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor WASM standalone deployment - Publish Single Assembly File #42088
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile - Core3.1 #42086

Closed

  • DataProtection DPAPI NG fails to decrypt values after cloning VM to a different network location #41970
  • Detected package version outside of dependency constraint: Duende.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Storage 5.2.0 #41897
  • Use ToString() of bool instead of normal boolean strings in HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions #42020
  • Hot Reload is broken! VS 2022 17.1.0 #40527
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add Java client implementation for client results #41953
  • Kestrel does not allow spaces after the request line #41824
    6.0.7
  • Kestrel support for WebSockets over HTTP/2 #7801
    7.0-preview6
  • Help on #41471 use my own NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter #41883
    6.0.x
  • [dotnet-watch] E2E tests for dotnet-watch #41713
    .NET 7 Planning
  • JSRuntime "open" with "_blank" throws TaskCanceledException 60 seconds later #41934
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Release/6.0] Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #41853
    Test failures
  • `app.UseSpa` should serve `DefaultPageStaticFile` with `cache-control: no-cache` to avoid cache trap #42069
  • Perf improvement: https, json #42080
  • Build the Kestrel.Transport.Sockets nuget package #42067

PullRequests

Created

  • modify the route to display username and date #42099
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Update branding to 2.1.36 #42094
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add debugging of repeated config issues #42085
    investigate, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Reset Upgraded state for re-used streams #42098
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.7
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • release/6.0 Quarantine all but pri 0 shadow copy test #41738
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Vector instead of direct Intrinsics #41790
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add `razor-compiler` cross-link on `issues` page #42076
    area-infrastructure
  • [user-jwts] Read and generate secrets ID with SecretsManager #42006
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • catch JS exceptions when using InvokeAsync and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Clean up test retry list #42074
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41969
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor MAUI Changing AppIcon and Splash screen seems trivial, fails to compile after making changes #7872
  • [BUG] Have a few images in a repo but compiler fails with warning on Distinctfilenames which they are. #7871
  • MAUI + iOS: hit testing is very inaccurate #7870
  • MAUI + Android: missing or misplaced adorners #7869
  • Sync blazorserver & blazor-maui templates #7868
  • Entry property CursorPosition is not updated #7867
  • MacCatalyst Bundle has "Windows" platform folder in Contents/Resources/Platforms instead of "MacCatalyst" folder #7866
  • .net blazor maui Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException "Byte array index ... does not exist" using DotNetStreamReference #7865
  • Update templates for platform selection #7864
  • Text input of Entry and Editor break modal visualization #7861
  • Deploying the App in Release Version Crash on Android Physical Device but works if deployed as Debug Version #7860
  • Placeholder text alignment not respected on Windows ref #3808 #7844
  • ILifecycleBuilder #7843
  • Animation Sample Project #7838

Closed

  • Unable to build MacCatalyst when a lib with native dependencies is referenced. #7829
  • [Bug] Fix SearchView Accessibility to read out Semantic Hint #1228
    6.0-servicing
  • Net.Maui Blazor not running on Android 7.1 Tablet #7840
  • [iOS] Shell.SearchHandler crashes the app #7553
    6.0-sr2
  • Two groups of radio buttons acts like one group in Windows #7564
  • (Windows) RC2 - LayoutCycleException when the height or width of a control is less than 0 #6987
    6.0-sr2

PullRequests

Created

  • MAUI to 6.0.400 #7862

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.6 to 1.2.1.7 #7852
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.1.2 #7850
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.8 to 1.0.0.9 #7849
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.6 to 1.6.1.7 #7845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Adding Alternate Key when Unique Clustered Index already Exists #28189
  • Style: Error SA1514 Element documentation header should be preceded by blank line #28187
  • Cosmos db Hierarchical Partitions in EF Core #28186
  • SQL Server: Scaffold HasTrigger if the table contains triggers #28185
  • Spatial: Translate EnvelopeCombiner.Combine aggregate function #28184
  • Better support for raw sql #28182

Closed

  • The specified deps.json [..] does not exist #28188
  • Code generated by `dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold` should be marked as auto-generated #28180
  • Can not use EF core 3.1 in .net 6 #28163
  • Run tests in DEBUG in CI (in addition to RELEASE) #28147
  • Migration is not smart enough to combine mutually exclusive settings #28183
  • [CosmosDB] Handling Concurrency when owned entities are updated externally #28166

PullRequests

Merged

  • Explicitly exclude MSSQL NTS EF.Functions from parameter extraction #28179
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.27.0 to 3.27.2 #28167
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Add entity-splitting model building support #28156
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
    needs-design
  • Json Columns initial work #28171

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cross-gen for DumpMinitool #13939

Merged

  • Remove dockerfiles per compliance #13910
  • Disable test that's downloading an out of support 3.0 runtime pack. #13922
  • Remove the external docker files and fix the debbuild #13908
  • Fix the deb build #13864
  • Fix the deb build by getting debuild first #13863
  • Add linux-bionic-* known runtime packs #13909
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13934
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #13935
